commands.commandLine: cd /projects && git clone https://github.com/RedHatTraining/rht-labs-todolist-api.git todolist-api && cd todolist-api && ./git-pull-all.sh && git checkout develop && npm i && echo "done"
commands.name: init-api

commands.commandLine: cd /projects && git clone https://github.com/RedHatTraining/rht-labs-todolist-fe.git todolist-fe && cd todolist-fe && ./git-pull-all.sh && git checkout develop && sed -i 's/4.7.2/4.12.0/g' package.json && npm i && echo "done"
commands.name: init-fe

recipe.content:
kind: List
items:
 - 
  apiVersion: apps/v1
  kind: Deployment
  metadata:
   name: my-deployment
  spec:
   replicas: 1
   selector:
    matchLabels:
     my-workspace-pod: dev
   template:
    metadata:
     name: dev-pod
     labels:
      my-workspace-pod: dev
    spec:
     containers:
      - 
       image: 'quay.io/mcanoy/stacks-node-rhel8-ansible:latest'
       name: main
       ports:
        - 
         containerPort: 8080
         protocol: TCP
      - 
       image: 'mongo:latest'
       name: main-mongo
       ports:
        - 
         containerPort: 27017
         protocol: TCP
 - 
  kind: Service
  apiVersion: v1
  metadata:
   name: my-service
  spec:
   selector:
    name: app
   ports:
    - 
     protocol: TCP
     port: 8080
     targetPort: 8080
